body:
Hello! 



Just a quick one - is it possible to remove the legend bar (the one showing figures and corresponding colours) altogether when getting results for daylight simulation?

I am trying to simulate batch rooms and I dont want every one of them to repeat the same legend bar.  



Is it possible to just have one large legend bar next to the model?



Regards



Dmitri

replies.body: It's possible. Join the meshes and flatten the results. Then you will get a single legend.

Works like a charm! Thanks Mostapha!

How about having one legend bar, but leaving the titles of individual meshes in tact so I can label individual rooms?
I think you can do that by managing the previews. Turn of the preview for recolor mesh. Use item selector to just select the labels. Create a separate legend using createLegend component.
